mapper.sql: select favorites_id,goods.goods_id, goods_main_image,goods_name, goods_now_price,goods_old_price from favorites_record,goods,goods_sku where favorites_record.goods_id=goods.goods_id and goods_sku.goods_id=goods.goods_id

select s.store_id,store.store_name,favorites_id,goods.goods_id, goods_main_image,goods_name, goods_now_price,goods_old_price from favorites_record,goods,goods_sku,store,(select store_id from store GROUP BY store_id) as s where favorites_record.goods_id=goods.goods_id and goods_sku.goods_id=goods.goods_id and s.store_id=goods.store_id and s.store_id=store.store_id
select favorites_id,store.store_id,store_name from favorites_record,store where favorites_record.store_id=store.store_id
